body: Sentry is ok for the service. Client code requires some thinking through --  see [JS exceptions](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection#Common_Problems) in the wiki under data. When someone is ready to work on this, I'm happy to help work through the concerns and find the right data steward.
